mapper.select: SELECT e.request_no AS requestNo ,t.teacher_name AS teacherNO ,c.category_name AS categoryNo ,e.request_name AS requestName ,e.request_reason AS requestReason ,e.request_price AS requestPrice ,e.request_day AS requestDay FROM equipment_request e INNER JOIN teacher t ON t.teacher_no = e.teacher_no INNER JOIN equipment_request_category c ON c.category_no = e.category_no ORDER BY e.request_no ASC;

SELECT equipment_no AS equipmentNo ,license_kindergarten AS licenseKindergarten ,equipment_name AS equipmentName ,teacher_no AS teacherNo ,category_no AS categoryNo ,equipment_cost AS equipmentCost ,equipment_amount AS equipmentAmount ,equipment_customer AS equipmentCustomer ,equipment_state AS equipmentState ,equipment_day AS equipmentDay FROM equipment GROUP BY equipment_name ORDER BY equipment_day DESC LIMIT #{equipmnetCount};
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT equipment_name) FROM equipment WHERE license_kindergarten=#{licenseKindergarten};

SELECT equipment_category_no AS equipmentCategoryNo ,value_name AS valueName ,value_merge AS valueMerge ,value_val AS valueVal ,value_borders AS valueBorders ,value_row AS valueRow ,value_cols AS valueCols FROM sheet_value WHERE license_kindergarten=#{licenseKindergarten} AND value_name=#{valueName} AND equipment_category_no=#{equipmentCategoryNo} ORDER BY value_no DESC LIMIT 1;
SELECT equipment_category_no AS equipmentCategoryNo ,value_name AS valueName FROM sheet_value WHERE license_kindergarten = #{licenseKindergarten} ORDER BY value_no DESC;
SELECT category_no AS categoryNo, category_name AS categoryName FROM equipment_category;
SELECT sheet_no AS sheetNo ,teacher_no AS teacherNo ,license_kindergarten AS licenseKindergarten ,sheet_content AS sheetContent FROM sheet_value WHERE teacher_no = #{teacherNo};
